text:
On the above-referenced page, 'cyberthugs.com' is used in the example 'deny'
directive.  I have owned cyberthugs.com for 10 years and use it as my primary
mail domain as well as for many other activities (such as running httpd).  I
would prefer to not have it referenced here.  Can this please be changed?
creator: ddewey@cyberthugs.com

text:
Fixed in trunk and in the 2.0 and 2.2 branches.  Should percolate through to 
the online documentation in the next couple of days, as well as future 
releases.
creator: nick@webthing.com
